resources.string: CyberCard acts as a convenient way to give out your contact information. Anywhere from business to personal information, CyberCard helps to provide users with their own QR code to be scanned in order to generate a new contact with their provided information.

The main advanced feature is the generation of the QR code from the provided information. After scanning the QR code a new contact is opened on the device that scanned and the information provided fills in the contact.
